question: 心強い
sourceMnemonic: Things that make your <kanji>heart</kanji> <kanji>strong</kanji> are <vocabulary>reassuring</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>heartening</vocabulary> to hear. You can practically feel your heart becoming stronger in your chest.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You learned them when you learned the words <ja>心</ja> and <ja>強い</ja>, so you should be able to read this on your own. Just note that <ja>つよい</ja> gets rendaku'd to <ja>づよい</ja>!
